sentences.en: Caries are chronic infectious diseases and the consequence of oral ecologic disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 龋病是慢性感染性疾病,是口腔生态平衡失调的结果.

sentences.en: I feel my life cracking within me from too much intensity, too much disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 我感到我的生命由于太过于激烈 、 太过于不安定,而破裂了.

sentences.en: It is the disequilibrium between transportation supply and demand that brings the problems.
sentences.cn: 产生交通问题的实质是交通供给与需求的不均衡造成的.

sentences.en: Make a figure to explain the state of equilibrium and disequilibrium of economy operation of urbanization.
sentences.cn: 绘图说明城市化经济运行的均衡状态和非均衡状态.

sentences.en: Nothing, then, is both equilibrium and disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 那么, 既能平衡又能失衡的,只有“无”.

sentences.en: Perpetual change means persistent disequilibrium, the permanent almost - fallen state.
sentences.cn: 永恒的变化意味着持续的不平衡, 永远处在即将跌落的状态.

sentences.en: Point out, press dweller group and geographical area. Distributinging miserably is disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 指出, 按居民群体和地理区域. 贫困的分布是不均衡的.

sentences.en: Results: No transmission disequilibrium between D 2 S 333 and CDH was found ( P > 0.05 ).
sentences.cn: 结果: 先天性髋脱位与D2S333遗传标记不存在传递连锁不平衡 ( P>0.05 ).

sentences.en: Secular disequilibrium of uranium can lead to erroneous results.
sentences.cn: 铀的永久不平衡会导致错误的结果.

sentences.en: The double track of fare is made, create public report car is locomotive quantity pole disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 票价的双轨制, 造成公共电汽车运载量极不均衡.

sentences.en: The study on the sex preference address the origin of the sex ratio disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 性别偏好的研究,源于出生人口性别比的异常.

sentences.en: There may be a period of disequilibrium as family members adjust to the new baby.
sentences.cn: 家庭成员对新婴儿可能有个比较混乱的适应期。

sentences.en: This does not explain the initial disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 这一点并不能说明最初的不平衡.

sentences.en: This would also be in China's own interest because its economy is in disequilibrium.
sentences.cn: 这也会给中国带来好处,因为中国的经济正处于失衡状态.

sentences.en: Thus disequilibrium is a mark of waste, and imperfect efficiency of production.
sentences.cn: 因之,不均衡是浪费和生产效率有缺点的标志.

trans.tran_en: a lack of balance in something
